title: Dante’s Inferno – Cantos VI and VII
author: VD
content_html: A rather interesting take on the fate of nations, I thought. And despite its age, much superior to the absurd notions of the end of history that were being bruited about much more recently.
content_text: A rather interesting take on the fate of nations, I thought.  And despite its age, much superior to the absurd notions of the end of history that were being bruited about much more recently.
